about_the_game:
RETIREMENT NEVER LOOKED THIS DANGEROUS (or FUNNY)

Developed by Celtwood Games, Spatium is a story-driven rogue-lite action game set across the diverse planets of the Decem Galaxy. Join Japhyr, a hero weary of his past, and his sarcastic companion Pttec on their final mission, filled with humor, action, and exploration.

PILLARS

  • Rich Story and Humorous Tone
    Japhyr’s quest for retirement and Pttec’s sarcastic and flirtatious personality shape an unforgettable story with plenty of comedic moments.

  • Rogue-lite Structure
    Each run brings unique challenges with new planet layouts and evolving difficulties, offering a fresh adventure every time.

  • Intense Action and Strategy
    Fast-paced combat, challenging enemies, and tactical battles test your reflexes and strategic thinking.

  • Dynamic Planets and Environmental Interactions
    Each planet in the Decem Galaxy offers unique mechanics, puzzles, and themes, creating a distinctive experience at every step.

short_description: Japhyr tries to escape his days of heroism across the perilous planets of the Decem Galaxy, writing a new story in every run alongside his womanizing companion, Pttec. In this rogue-lite universe, dangerous enemies and plenty of laughter await you.
